quest.title: Question of interest
quest.placeholder: Write your question and we will answer it

quest1.title: How to choose the right paint color?
quest1.answer: To select a paint color, we recommend using our color palettes and online consultation.

quest2.title: What surfaces can be painted with Remalux paints?
quest2.answer: Our paints are suitable for painting walls, ceilings, doors, furniture, metal and wooden surfaces.

quest3.title: How long does it take for paint to dry completely?
quest3.answer: The drying time of the paint depends on the temperature and humidity in the room.

quest4.title: Are Remalux paints environmentally friendly?
quest4.answer: Yes, all Remalux paints are water-based and do not contain harmful substances.

quest5.title: Can I apply the paint myself, or do I need a specialist?
quest5.answer: Our paints are easy to apply yourself.

quest6.title: Where can I buy Remalux products?
quest6.answer: You can purchase Remalux paints in our partner stores or order them on our website.

newsletter.title: Join our newsletter
newsletter.description: Find out about decorating trends and ideas in our new monthly newsletter.

partnership.history_description: Remalux was founded over 30 years ago with one simple mission - to offer the highest quality paints that inspire unique and long-lasting designs.
partnership.title: Create bright projects with Remalux
partnership.history_1990: Remalux opened its doors with the goal of creating paints that will inspire and transform the world around us.
partnership.history_1995: We presented our first line of interior paints, immediately winning the trust of customers due to their high quality and variety of shades.
partnership.history_2000: We began to use new production technologies, significantly increasing the durability and environmental friendliness of our products.
partnership.history_2010: Remalux has expanded its presence throughout the country, offering products in large retail chains and specialty stores.
partnership.history_2015: We launched an export program, entering international markets and starting cooperation with partners around the world.
partnership.history_2023: We opened a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility, increasing our capacity and expanding our product range to better meet our customers' needs.
partnership.branches_description: Remlux has 6 branches in all major cities of Kazakhstan with its head office in Almaty.
partnership.news_title: Stay up to date with all the news
partnership.news_description: Do you want to be the first to know about new products, promotions and inspiring projects?
partnership.application_form_description: Do you want to become a Remalux partner and offer our customers the best paints?

hero_section.title: LLP "K-COLOR" "K-COLOR" with the trademark "REMALUX" - high European quality at an affordable price.
hero_section.description: LLP "K-COLOR" "K-COLOR" with the trademark "REMALUX" is a leader in the production of paints and varnishes, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan.

why_choose_us.title: Why do buyers choose our products?
why_choose_us.description: Our paints are trusted for their high quality, innovative solutions and economical consumption.

quality.title: High quality
quality.description: Our paints undergo strict quality control to ensure superior coverage and durability on any surface.

innovation.title: Innovative production technologies
innovation.description: We use advanced technology to create paints that apply easily, dry quickly and deliver rich colors.

economy.title: Economical consumption of materials
economy.description: Our paints provide high hiding power, which allows you to reduce consumption and reduce costs.

price.title: Competitive prices
price.description: We offer excellent value for money so you can get a professional product at an affordable price.

assortment.title: Wide range of products
assortment.description: In our assortment you will find paints for any need - from interior to industrial coatings, in a variety of colors and textures.

for_whom.title: Who are our company's products intended for?
for_whom.description: The products we produce are designed to easily satisfy the requirements of the most stringent highly qualified professionals for use in prestigious, executive-level facilities.

remalux_section.title: REMALUX: Everything you need for perfect results
remalux_section.description: REMALUX offers high-quality paints and varnishes with modern technology and excellent service.

innovation.title: Innovative technologies and modern production methods
innovation.description: The production of paints and varnishes at REMALUX is based on modern technologies and achievements of chemical science, which guarantees high quality and safety of products at competitive prices.

service.title: Service
service.description: We provide pre-purchase and post-purchase services to meet customer requirements through high quality products and excellent service.

assortment.title: Wide range of products
assortment.description: REMALUX offers texture coatings, water-based paints, varnishes, acrylic adhesives and other materials.

safety.title: Safety and comfort in use
safety.description: Water-based products are non-toxic and odorless, which ensures comfortable use for both professionals and home craftsmen.

our_fleet.title: Our fleet: Fast and reliable delivery
our_fleet.description: The products we produce are designed to easily satisfy the requirements of the most stringent highly qualified professionals for use in prestigious, executive-level facilities.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: The privacy policy (hereinafter - the Policy) applies to personal data that K-COLOR LLP "K-COLOR" (hereinafter - the LLP) can receive from the user when the latter visits the site https://remalux.kz (hereinafter - the Site)

terms.title: 1. DEFINITION OF TERMS
terms.admin: The site administration (hereinafter referred to as the Administration) is authorized employees...
terms.personal_data: Personal data - any information relating to a directly or indirectly identified person...
terms.data_processing: Processing of personal data is any action (operation) or set of actions...
terms.confidentiality: Confidentiality of personal data is a must...
terms.site: The website of the online store remalux.kz (hereinafter referred to as the Website) is a collection of interconnected web pages...
terms.user: Site user (hereinafter referred to as User) is a person who has access to the site...
terms.cookies: Cookies are a small piece of data sent by a web server and stored on the user's computer...
terms.ip_address: IP address is a unique network address of a node on a computer network through which the User gains access...
terms.product: Goods - a product that the User orders on the website and pays through payment systems.

general.title: 2. GENERAL PROVISIONS
general.usage: Use of the Site Online store remalux.kz by the User means agreement with this Privacy Policy...
general.disagreement: In case of disagreement with the terms of the Privacy Policy, the User must stop using the Site.
general.application: This Privacy Policy applies to the website owned by K-COLOR LLP "K-COLOR"...
general.verification: The Administration does not verify the accuracy of the personal data provided by the User.

subject.title: 3. SCOPE OF THE PRIVACY POLICY
subject.obligations: This Privacy Policy establishes the Administration's non-disclosure obligations...
subject.data: Personal data permitted for processing under this Privacy Policy...
subject.ssl: The online store uses a certified SSL key for data encryption when transmitted via the HTTPS protocol...
subject.cookies: Disabling cookies may result in the inability to access parts of the site that require authorization.
subject.other_info: Any other personal information not specified above is subject to secure storage and non-distribution...

purposes.title: 4. PURPOSES OF COLLECTING USER’S PERSONAL INFORMATION
purposes.identification: Identification of the User registered on the Site for his further authorization...
purposes.access: Providing the User with access to personalized data from the Site.
purposes.feedback: Establishing feedback with the User, including sending notifications...
purposes.location: Determining the User's location to ensure security, prevent fraud...

processing.title: 5. METHODS AND TERMS OF PROCESSING PERSONAL DATA
processing.methods: The processing of the User's personal data is carried out without limitation of time, in any legal way...
processing.third_parties: The User agrees that the Administration has the right to transfer personal data to third parties...
processing.government: The User's personal data may be transferred to authorized government bodies of the Republic of Kazakhstan...
processing.loss: In case of loss or disclosure of personal data, the Administration has the right not to inform the User...
processing.measures: The Administration takes the necessary organizational and technical measures to protect the User’s personal information...
processing.cooperation: The Administration, together with the User, takes all necessary measures to prevent losses or other negative consequences...

rights.title: 6. RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE PARTIES
rights.decision: The user has the right to make a free decision about providing his personal data...
rights.information: The User has the right to receive from the Administration information regarding the processing of his personal data...
rights.use: The administration is obliged to use the information received exclusively for the purposes specified in clause 4 of this Policy...
rights.confidentiality: The Administration is obliged to ensure that confidential information is kept secret and not disclosed without the prior written permission of the User...
rights.blocking: The Administration is obliged to block the User’s personal data from the moment the User contacts or requests...

responsibilities.title: 7. RESPONSIBILITY OF THE PARTIES
responsibilities.loss: The administration that fails to fulfill its obligations is responsible for losses incurred by the User...
responsibilities.disclosure: The administration is not responsible for the loss or disclosure of confidential information if this information...
responsibilities.law: The user bears full responsibility for compliance with the requirements of the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan...
responsibilities.deletion: The Administration is not liable to the User for any loss or damage incurred by the User as a result of the removal...
responsibilities.usage: The administration is not responsible for any direct or indirect losses resulting from: use or inability to use the Site...

disputes.title: 8. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
disputes.pre_court: Before filing a claim in court regarding disputes arising from the relationship between the User and the Administration...
disputes.notification: The recipient of the claim, within 20 calendar days from the date of receipt of the claim, notifies the applicant in writing or electronically...
disputes.arbitration: If no agreement is reached, the dispute will be referred to the Arbitration Court of Almaty.
disputes.law: The current legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan applies to this Privacy Policy and the relationship between the User and the Administration.

additional.title: 9. ADDITIONAL TERMS
additional.changes: The Administration has the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy without the User’s consent.
additional.effective_date: The new Privacy Policy comes into force from the moment it is posted on the Site, unless otherwise provided by the new edition of the Privacy Policy.

payment_delivery.title: DELIVERY METHODS AND COSTS
payment_delivery.pickup: Self-pickup – receipt of goods at the company’s office within 3 working days after the order status changes to “Available”.
cash_payment_details: Cash payment is available at the checkout of a retail store when picking up the ordered goods.
Payment is made in the national currency “tenge”.
After receiving payment, a sales receipt is issued.
payment_delivery.card_payment_on_receipt: Payment by bank payment card upon receipt:
card_payment_on_receipt_details: Payment by bank payment card is available at the checkout of a retail store when picking up the ordered goods.
payment_delivery.card_payment_online: Payment by bank payment card on the website when placing an order
card_payment_online_details: The payment method requires payment by bank card.
The system will automatically redirect you to the ePay electronic payment page of Halyk Bank of Kazakhstan JSC to enter card data.

public_offer.title: PUBLIC OFFER AGREEMENT
public_offer.subtitle: Online store remalux.kz
public_offer.intro: This agreement between the online store remalux.kz, hereinafter referred to as the “Online store/Seller” and the user of the online store services, hereinafter referred to as the “Buyer”, defines the conditions for the purchase of goods through the online store website

terms.title: TERMS AND DEFINITIONS
terms.buyer: Buyer - any fully capable individual who orders or purchases goods by placing an Order on the website
terms.seller: The Seller is “K-COLOR” LLP “K-COLOR” (BIN 010440005708), an organization that sells Goods remotely, under a retail sales contract concluded on the basis of the buyer’s familiarization with what is offered on the Seller’s website at the address: remalux.kz.
terms.store: Online store - an Internet site owned by the Seller, where the goods offered by the Seller to its Buyers for placing Orders are presented, as well as the terms of payment and delivery of these Orders to Buyers.
terms.product: Goods are an object of the material world that has not been removed from civil circulation and is presented for sale on the Site and is available at the time of confirmation of shipment.
terms.order: Order - a duly completed request from the Buyer for delivery to the specified address of the list of Products selected on the Site.
terms.account: Personal Account - the Buyer’s personal page on the Site, to access which a login and password are required, and on which information about the Buyer and his Orders is stored.
terms.delivery_service: Delivery service is a third party that, under an agreement with the Seller, provides services for the delivery of Orders to Buyers.

general_provisions.title: 1. GENERAL PROVISIONS
general_provisions.item1: By ordering goods through the online store, the Buyer agrees to the Terms of Sale of Goods set out below.
general_provisions.item2: These Terms and information about the Product presented on the Site are a public offer in accordance with Article 395 of the Civil Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan, and if the conditions are accepted, the individual accepting this offer makes payment for the Seller’s Product in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
general_provisions.item3: The provisions of the Civil Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan, the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan dated May 4, 2010 No. 274-IV “On the Protection of Consumer Rights” and other regulatory legal acts of the current legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan apply to the relationship between the Buyer and the Seller.
general_provisions.item4: The Seller reserves the right to make changes to these Terms, and the Buyer undertakes to regularly monitor changes in the “Public Offer Agreement” section.
general_provisions.item5: The Buyer agrees to the Terms by clicking the “Place an Order” button at the last stage of placing an Order on the Site.

registration.title: 2. REGISTRATION ON THE SITE
registration.item1: To place an Order, the Buyer is recommended to register on the Site.
registration.item2: The Seller is not responsible for the accuracy and correctness of the information provided by the Buyer during registration.
registration.item3: The buyer undertakes not to disclose to third parties the login and password specified when registering his personal account.

order_placement.title: 3. ORDER COMPLETION AND DATES
order_placement.item1: The Buyer’s order can be placed in the following ways: accepted by telephone or placed by the Buyer independently on the Site.
order_placement.item2: When placing an Order, the Buyer must indicate the following information: Full name.
order_placement.item3: The Seller has the right to refuse to conclude an agreement and place an Order without specifying reasons.
order_placement.item4: The order fulfillment period is from one working day, and can be negotiated individually depending on the characteristics and quantity of the Product.
order_placement.item5: Information materials on the Site are for reference purposes and may not fully convey information about the Product.

delivery.title: 4. DELIVERY
delivery.item1: Methods of delivery of goods are agreed upon by the Buyer with the manager of the online store.
delivery.item2: Delivery of Orders is carried out to the address specified by the Buyer, or by pickup from the store.
delivery.item3: The Seller will make every effort to meet delivery deadlines, but delays may occur due to circumstances beyond the Seller’s control.
delivery.item4: The risk of accidental loss or damage to the Goods passes to the Buyer from the moment the Order is transferred and signatures are received on the documents.
delivery.item5: The delivery cost of each Order is calculated individually and is indicated at the last stage of placing the Order.

price_payment.title: 5. PRICE AND PAYMENT OF GOODS
price_payment.item1: The price of the Product in the online store is indicated in tenge.
price_payment.item2: The Seller has the right to change the price of the Product unilaterally, but the price of the paid Product cannot be changed.
price_payment.item3: The price of the Product is indicated at the last stage of placing the Order and is current at the time you click the “Place an order” button.
price_payment.item4: Methods of payment for the Goods are indicated on the Site.

returns.title: 6. RETURN OF GOODS AND MONEY
returns.item1: Return of goods of good quality is possible within 14 days from the date of receipt, provided that the presentation and documents confirming the purchase are preserved.
returns.item2: Returning goods of inadequate quality is possible if defects are detected, no later than 3 months before the expiration date of the product.
returns.item3: Refunds are made to the bank card with which the Order was paid.

copyright.title: 7. COPYRIGHT
copyright.content: All materials presented on the Site are the property of K-COLOR LLP “K-COLOR” and are protected by copyright law.

warranty.title: 8. WARRANTY AND LIABILITY
warranty.content: The Seller is not responsible for damage caused to the Buyer due to improper use of the Goods.

confidentiality.title: 9. CONFIDENTIALITY AND PROTECTION OF PERSONAL INFORMATION
confidentiality.content: The Seller undertakes not to disclose the Buyer’s personal data.

footer.content: Detailed information can be found on the official website: remalux.kz.
